{{ student.name }} {{ student.age }} {{ student.subject }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Student } from '../student'; import { StudentService } from '../student.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-list', templateUrl: './student-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-list.component.css'] }) export class StudentListComponent implements OnInit{ students: Student[]; //inject student service into the component constructor(private studentService: StudentService, private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getStudents(); } private getStudents(){ this.studentService.getStudentList().subscribe(data => { this.students = data; }); } updateStudent(id: string){ this.router.navigate(['update-student', id]); } deleteStudent(id: string){ this.studentService.deleteStudent(id).subscribe(data => { console.log(data); this.getStudents(); }) } }
